questions.subject: ComfyUI
questions.question: What is the purpose of the Make Square Node?
questions.answer: The Make Square Node will pad an image to make it square with a chosen filling strategy.

questions.subject: ComfyUI.TextEncodeAIO
questions.question: How does the TextEncodeAIO node work?
questions.answer: The TextEncodeAIO node attempts to replicate the behavior of the A1111 extension's 'StylePile' feature.

questions.subject: ComfyUI.Installation
questions.question: How do I install the comfy-pants custom nodes?
questions.answer: Clone the repository to the `custom_nodes` folder and install the dependencies using pip.
